metadata.title: RHSA-2009:0344 -- libsoup security update (Moderate)
metadata.description: Updated libsoup and evolution28-libsoup packages that fix a security issue are now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4 and 5. This update has been rated as having moderate security impact by the Red Hat Security Response Team. libsoup is an HTTP client/library implementation for GNOME written in C. It was originally part of a SOAP (Simple Object Access Protocol) implementation called Soup, but the SOAP and non-SOAP parts have now been split into separate packages.

criteria.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5 release section

extend_definition.comment: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5

criteria.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4 release section

extend_definition.comment: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4
